name: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering
summary: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering is a megawad (full 32 maps + 4 bonus) by @Arsinikk and @NinjaDelphox with the goal of making Vanilla slaughter-like maps under 200 lines. It is the sequel to 100 Line Massacre and also features additional mapping by @scwiba and @finnks13.
